text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn Josua mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia faragha pura Isipian ingangarir gumazir kɨnibar mɨn ikia bar aghumsɨki. Ezɨ kɨ datɨrɨghɨn ia da aghumsɨzir kam batoke.” Kamaghɨn datɨrɨghɨn danganir kam, me Gilgal a garɨgha a dɨboravɨra iti.5:9 Hibrun akamɨn ziam Gilgal, an mɨngarim, “Batoke.”
